transcript: mortality has been the single biggest driver and the biggest decisions that I've made in my life and it has become a more routine process for decision making for me in general because I think it provides Clarity and it provides context to most of the decisions we have which the vast majority of them don't matter right and so it was using that context for that biggest decision that's been duplicated many times in my life since then because if I have a good decision-making algorithm I try and reuse it as many times as I can
